title: Gendered Toponyms
description: Tool to track vaccination campaign against COVID-19 in India.

title: India COVID-19 Vaccine Tracker
description: Mapping gender imbalance in city street names.

title: Air Quality Data Portal
description: Compare real-time worldwide air quality levels with interactive air quality (PM 2.5 concentration) and pollution map.

title: COVID-19 Dashboard
description: Tool to track and visualize the spread of COVID-19 coronavirus.

title: Every Breath we Take!
description: A project exploring air pollution in India and its effect on the health and economy.

title: Falsehood flies, and the Truth comes limping after it
description: A project exploring influence campaign & disinformation on Twitter.

title: Indian General Election Results
description: A visual exploration of World's biggest electoral exercise i.e. Indian general election.

title: SafeGlobe Arms Report
description: Interactive data visualisations, visualizing Finnish arms export data. This project was done in collaboration with SaferGlobe as a part of my work at Futurice.
